name: Commando Strike - Sniper 3D Army Assassin
description:
Let the bullets fly in the sequel to the popular third-person shooter, Commando Strike

This is an amazing 3rd person counter strike like shooter, Fight enemy bots in survival modes.

- Maximize your firepower with multiple, upgradable weapon classes including sniper rifles, assault rifles, shotguns and machine guns.

****Features****

– 8 HD different maps

– 60 HD environments unlocked

– 4 different enemies

– 20 different weapons

– Highly polished menus – Highly polished controls
